name: Child's Play
description:
## Babysitting with Guns

When a family’s dysfunction leads to an opportunity for some hot new tech and the associated research, you can bet the shadows are interested in making some easy nuyen. A fixer brings you the job of working security on the transfer of talent and gear, but the catch is that Mr. Johnson is young and inexperienced. And he’s also worked out who’s buying the paydata. His naïveté might be your doom as you fight to keep your payday alive.
